title: The 2-Parametric Extension of $h$ Deformation of $GL(2)$, and The Differential Calculus on Its Quantum Plane
abstract: We present an alternative 2-parametric deformation $ GL(2)_{h,h'} $ , and construct the differential calculus on the quantum plane on which this quantum group acts. Also we give a new deformation of the two dimensional Heisenberg algebra
